heroTitle: Improve Your English Skills With Interactive Learning
heroDescription: Read articles, listen to pronunciation, and learn new vocabulary with our interactive tools.
interactiveArticlesDesc: Read engaging articles on various topics to improve your reading comprehension and vocabulary.
textToSpeechDesc: Listen to clear pronunciation of words and entire articles to improve your listening and speaking skills.
builtInDictionaryDesc: Click on any word to see its definition, examples, and pronunciation without leaving the article.
signUpDesc: Sign up for free and start your learning journey today!
